Blog.post: I'm back to myself as early as yesterday. Amazing coz normally I took longer period to recover my anger + bored . Yeah, I guess when you have someone so dearly in your heart, things will be very much easier...Thanks so much for being there when I most need him... And last Tuesday, I wasn't plan to go anywhere but I just can't wait for meeting someone. So, KLCC was the destination. Guess who..?? Norarnida @ Doda :-) We had great quality time spent together...Thanks Doda, it was nice having you around. All the memory that we've been through in campus keeps flying in my memory... Just can't wait to see my fiance tomorrow. We're supposed to have crazy shopping but not until we drop..hahaha. But the most important is to recap of what happened between us last 2 weeks. So guys, I will be not around until Monday as I'm planning to take a breakaway this weekend. See you all again.

Ha ha...seems like my fotopages can link with my blogger. Two thumbs up for the clever mind of mine...hehehe. Boring Boring Boring Boring Boring. For the past few days, and actually already 2 consecutive weeks to be exact, I have no job aka assignment to be done. Still in the office and doing nothing. Arghhh...suddenly I'm so sleepy, tho' I went to sleep early last nite...early?? but not so early as I watch 'Pontianak Harum Sundal Malam'...hehe. Give that 3.5 stars out of 5. My mom has just call me and said that Bariah (my best friend since secondary school) has delivered a baby girl but something miserable happened as her baby died earlier. Pity her *sob* *sob*. It was already six month and...only God knows. Nothing much to say but trying to comfort her as I can. My tears drop and suddenly I feel so gloomy. Sometimes, my heart can be so fragile at times...maybe its a sign of woman instict. To my best friend, a condolence for you from both of us (read this as me and my fiance).

Isteri tau suami sayangkan isteri... walau tak kerap bunga ros dihadiahkan walau jarang sangat ada candlelight dinner atau makan special yang romantik walau kurang hadiah intan emas permata walau tak selalu suami kata "I love you" dengan penuh perasaan walau begitu jarang suami nyanyikan lagu cinta walau hidup tak semewah mana Isteri tau suami sayangkan isteri.... Dan isteri tau bukan bunga ros jaminan kejujuran bukan kata-kata romantik jaminan taat setia bukan intan berlian jaminan kasih sayang dan bukan juga kemewahan jaminan kebahagiaan... Tapi isteri hanya perempuan... Nafsu yang sembilan kengkadang membuat isteri tertanya-tanya Mana bunga ros merah... mana cincin berlian habib jewel mana itu dan mana ini dari insan tercinta Namun walau tiada itu semua... Isteri tetap tau suami sayangkan isteri... Dan suami tetap no.1 di hati isteri.... Dan suami pula Kalau tak mampu cincin berlian habib jewel.... Bunga ros merah setengah dozen pun dah mampu menceriakan suasana Chocolate yang dalam kotak bentuk LOVE dah boleh memujuk isteri... Kerana sibuk seharian kita terlupa untuk bercinta.... Dengan itu, hangatkan kembali api cinta.... dan kembalilah bercinta.... seperti waktu mula-mula bertemu dulu.... Conclusion : Things are great even if it's only a very little stuff when you enjoy doing it together with your love one... p/s : Syukur alhamdulillah...After all the hard times and tough obstacles being tested on me and the other half for a past few days, now I'm glad it's over and everything is moving smoothly. InsyaAllah, we'll both go thru all the ups and downs together and do pray for our happiness till the rest of our lives. Abang... I love you... ( ^_^ )

Hey out there, have a glance with my new uploaded fotopages in my blog. Hopefully there were no such an error...at last I made it :-) The picture mostly, ooppsss; to be exact were all captured during Family Day at Reviera Beach Resort --> urlLink craps by Azni Haida

Yesterday and until today, my beloved fiance and me had a silent treatment. After so long since the past 3 years we didn't get into problem in our relationship, and suddenly yesterday it happened. I'm still terribly sad at the moment and I bet it's going to be longggg to recover. This sadness turns me into a very very mellow little girl. Anyway, I believe the ever-showering blessings from the Almighty will help to reduce the pain. Yet, I'm now really missing him sooo much. He starts calling me 10 times yesterday and I'm purposely didn't hang it up. This morning and just now, he calls me again. Sorry my dear, I didn't meant to but I need to empty up the head so that I can start smiling again... Honey, thanks for being my shoulder to cry on especially last night although we are in a silent fight. Thanks for your ears and patient and of course your sweet romantic words that makes my tears drop heavily. I will never forget what you've saying last night ever. But just give me some times to recover it back. Just to let you know; there will never be other man as sweet as you.. I love you with all my heart forever and ever. p/s: Ida sayang Abang

*Sigh* Hectic weekend during the Family day at Riveara Beach Resort. Now, I'm in the office doing my routine works again and again...bila la nak siap jurnal aku nie. Sorry, don't have any time to update my bloger yesterday and today, curi-curi masa masuk blog ni utk release tension...berpinar dah bijik mata tengok excel jurnal yg beribu-ribu line tu. So, as I told earlier that I'm participating the treasure hunt on Family Day, YES!!! my group won the top ten prizes on it. We managed to answer all the questions (although get 6 wrong answers), we get a number 8th prizes among all the 33 participation. Proud haaa (read this as its my first time treasure). And malam tu jugak my group buat persembahan Boria Prodata. Wow!!! ramai gak mata terpegun tengok kitorang menari mlm tu...mesti tak percaya. Apapun, mlm tu group kitorang yg paling best antara 3 group yg lain. tak sia-sia practise setiap petang selama 2 miggu. A big thanks to our lead, Irma. Then, the next day, we have fun playing all the childhood games in Sukaneka Prodata. Lawak tu...tapi memang happenning lah. Lupa semua pasal kerja, SKB, SAP, GL journal etc. Banyak tu ambik gambar but sorry, I'm still cannot managed to upload the fotopages inside the bloger. InsyaAllah, by the time I'm free, I will upload it to share the happinest with you all. And for yesterday, my heart is no more in working mood. Low motivation at all and one thing for sure, I was going back early yesterday. Going to Carefour Wangsa Maju and bought my moisterizer cream and a novel "Bisikan Rindu". That night had a cold argument with dearie but everything get to normal again this morning as he made a morning call for his appologize. Hemmm...don't do that again tau.

Pagi tadi ada ad-hock meeting with En. Ishak bahagian Hasil Sawit dan Getah. Mentioned about problems due to crops, users and management. So, I take this opportunity to review (read as complaining to be exact) all the problems that I had to face in Segamat especially about the users attitude and their work commitment. Just now I attend a Treasure Hunt briefing at Bilik Gerakan Wisma Felda. It is conducted by 'I Hunt Malaysian Club' which I give two tumbs up for the great and excitement brief. Macam tak sabar aje nak tunggu hari Sabtu utk pegi treasure hunt. I learn more on the new terms such as tulips, odometer trips, tiebreaker ext. That's it. Time to continue my work. There's a lot of G/L (about 3,000+++) lines to be journal. Arrggghhh!!! boring. Tak de short cut ke nak buat jurnal ni... p/s: ...more practising for the Family Day presentation this evening...and suddenly, I miss my Abang *sob*

Di mana pun ku berdiri Kau kan tetap ku ingati Kau selalu dekat dalam hati ini Dan tak pernah sehari pun Hari-hari yang berlalu Tanpa aku merindu mu kekasihku Saat kita berjauhan Jangan ada rasa bimbang Kerana cinta menyatukan perasaan Tak mengira detik waktu Ingin ku lafaz selalu Aku cinta kepada mu Walau seribu liku di depanku Akan tetap aku tempuh Dalam hatiku kau tak pernah jauh Walaupun terpaksa ku menunggu Tanpa jemu dan selalu Sentiasa dekat di hatiku Kau membuat hidup ini Semakin lebih bererti Kau miliki kelebihan tersendiri Tak mengira detik waktu Ingin ku lafaz selalu Aku cinta kepada mu p/s: For the one I love...whatever else may complicate our lives, one thing is pure and simple, I Love You heart and soul.

Today maybe a bad day for me as I am so frustrated with one of my user and always with my job commitment (to be exact). God please help.... I need more motivations somehow to go thru all the hassles in the office. I think, my work will be never ending, habis satu, ada lagi yang datang, pressure jugak woo... but then, pikir2 balik, they are just work... but i still have to do it with commitment. Rasa nak nak marah je dengan user yg sorang ni!!! SABAR... p/s: AEV 319 is now mine...

Gosh...pagi tadi kereta kena sita. Ni semua keje pak guard la ni. Alah, parking makan line orang sikit pun kena sita ke..?? Teruk betul management!! Terpaksa pulak jumpa bahagian security utk settlekan problem ni. Mujur akak kerani tu baik. Ni dok tunggu akak tu call, mintak mintak la pak guard bukak gari kereta tu. Kesian AEV 319, kena gari macam orang bersalah aje. Luv u my sweet car...

Buat jahat sikit hari Ahad tu, balik awal dan tinggalkan kerja sbb nak pi dating ngan abang. So, at 12.20 tu lari naik LRT sampai Sungai Besi dan tunggu abang kat sana. Malas nak bawak kete, hujan satu hal..jem lagi teruk. Tapi, sampai aje kat stesen Sungai Besi, terpaksa tunggu abang dalam setengah jam, hujan pulak tu. Macam nak marah aje, tapi sabar. So, dalam pukul 1 dia sampai, terus pergi Mines. MasyaAllah, punyalah banyak kereta sampai jem tempat nak parking tu. Menguji kesabaran betul. Nasib abang yg bawak kete. At last dapat jugak parking. Masuk je Mines, punyalah ramai manusia. Ni semua gara-gara Spiderman2 punya panangan lah ni. Nak beratur beli tiket pun satu hal..queue panjang!!! Abang dah try booking tiket tapi kat Mines tak boleh book online. Nasib baik dapat tiket, itupun dapat seat 4 dari depan...sakit leher pun takpe la, janji dapat tengok..hehehe. So, sementara tunggu nak tengok wayang perut pun dah berkeroncong. Maklumlah hujan, cepat lapar. Nak makan pun kena beratur panjang. So, at last makan KFC aje. Chick a cheese tak la sedap sangat, biasa aje..tipah tertipu!! Lepas makan, gi jalan-jalan. Ingat nak cari tudung dengan seluar slack hitam utk persembahan Family Day nanti tapi tudung punyala mahal kat Mines. So, slack je la yang dapat. Wayang habis dalam pukul 9.30 mlm. Terus ajak abang balik sebab dah penat sangat mata ni pakai lens. On the way balik Selayang pun jam jugak!!! This is what we called KL, JAMMED! Sempat singgah restoren utk supper sebab perut dah mula berbunyi minta diisi. Kesian abang, balik Damansara lewat pagi, pas tu kena bangun awal utk short course pulak. Sori, sayang abang :) Anyway, terima kasih abang untuk segalanya. I love u so much. Segala kesyukuran untuk-Mu kerana menemukan ku dengan seseorang yang baik budi pekerti, romantik dan yg paling penting memahami dan penyabar. p/s: Public apologize for my fiance for doing something that makes you unhappy and disappointed. Sorry my love, I did'nt mean to. Till the death do us part

My blogger just screwed up my head. I only managed to write my jurnal today since the blogger updates something in the page. Here I am...in the office doing my work on SUNDAY. Betul-betul giler kuasa. Tak lah, ni semua sbb nak habiskan keje coz the due date is next week. So, forget about all the thingy work plus people surrounding me (in this office of course)... Gosh! Last nite, my fiance, Syed and Azi pick me up at Selayang and we were going for a great dinner at Selayang Baru Seafood. Nice place and the food quite nice. Nothing much to say for both of us since I had faced a hectic work on Saturday and my fiance tired driving from Kuantan to KL. For Syed and Azi..heemmm...bila lagi, apa lagi nak tunggu ? p/s : Nice to see Syed and Azi again since the last time we met was on my engagement day.

Yeah...yeah!! My fiance is coming to see me in KL. Actually he had a short course training in KL at IBM and Mesiniaga for a week. Yeeahaaa!! Boleh jumpa :-D Tonite I will meet him and going for a dinner. My plan to mengular ngan member (read as Liza and Lin) was cancelled, not because of my date tonite but Lin have to stay back at her office in TNB Bangsar and Liza's mom is not feeling well. So, better going back home now and take a shower. Tak sabar nak kuar ngan abang malam ni...hehehe

Working on Saturday makes me feel bored and not too much if I said that it's not productive. Nothing much work to do but the crop problem makes me headache. Benci, muak :( Meeting with En. Ishak was cancelled...haaa..lega, but will be posponed next Wednesday. This evening will have 'boria' practising since my company Family Day will be held next week at Riveara Beach Resort, Melaka. Much more steps to discover and learn. Waaaa..penat, dah la keje sampai petang.

First of all, I have to listen all the Kak Ma's annoying about the user's attitude. Habis semua hasil sawit dan getah problem, tu yg Kak Ma bengang tu. User pun satu, bergantung sangat pada OSS (On-side System Support). Ni, baru je selesai settlekan problem Air Hitam. Muak dah...thanx to Syahman for helping me. Then on Saturday, all the OSS including me, have to see En. Ishak regarding the crop problems. Gosh! Segamat banyak problem tuhhh...better get ready all the SLP summary report before the day come (and of course to pretend myself, hehehe). Bila-bila masa je dari sekarang dah kena buat job baru. That 'girl' tengah dok compile file nak assign job tu. Oh ooo..she's coming, now I have a job to do. Better pen off now and do my work.

Planning to mengular pi jusco tak jadi...hujan. Malas nak drive dlm hujan lebat tu. So, urlLink time to get back urlLink home now. Errrkhhh, I'm starving, since don't take any meal for lunch. Can't stop thinking of keoteow tomyam pedas..yummiiee. Better get urlLink home now.

Tahukan anda biodata IBLIS : Nama: Iblis laknatullah Tempat lahir: bermula dari keenganannya sujud kepada Nabi Adam a.s Status: Fasik kelas pertama Agama: Kufur Tempat tinggal di dunia: Di dalam hati mereka yang lalai Tempat tinggal di akhirat: Neraka jahanam Kawasan legarnya: setiap tempat yang di dalamnya tiada usaha untuk mengingati Allah. Arah perjalanannya: tiada haluan dan bengkang bengkok Isteri di dunia: setiap wanita yang tidak menutup aurat dan tidak mentaati Allah, Rasul dan suaminya. Kaum kerabat: semua golongan yang menentang dan memusuhi Allah. Modal pusingan: angan-angan kosong Tempat pertemuan: Pasar dan pusat membeli belah. Musuh ketat: Orang islam yang beriman dan bertaqwa Kegemaran: melalaikan orang dari mengingati Allah, menggoda dan menyesatkan. Matlamat: supaya semua makhluk di muka bumi ini menjadi kafir dan sama-sama masuk Ke neraka jahanam. Kelemahan: Bila orang membaca istighfar Lambang: sebarang tatu Pejabat operasi: tandas, bilik air, tempat bernajis serta tempat maksiat. Rakan kongsi: golongan munafik serta syaitan dari kalangan jin dan manusia Sumber: segala harta yang diperolehi dengan jalan haram dan riba Makanan kegemaran: daging orang mati, segala najis dan kotoran. Yang ditakuti : orang mukmin yang beriman dan bertaqwa kepada Allah. Tempoh perkhidmatan : sehingga hari kiamat p/s : dgn itu sesame la kite menjadi org yg bertakwa dan berdoa kpd Allah SWT moga dijauhkan dari iblis laknatullah....insyaAllah...

a) Jika kita mencintai sesorang, kita akan sentiasa mendoakannya walaupun dia tidak berada disisi kita Jangan sesekali mengucapkan selamat tinggal jika kamu masih mahu mencuba, jangan sesekali menyerah jika kamu masih merasa sanggup, jangan sesekali mengatakan kamu tidak mencintainya lagi jika kamu masih tidak dapat melupakannya. b) Jangan simpan kata-kata cinta pada orang yang tersayang sehingga dia meninggal dunia , lantaran akhirnya kamu terpaksa catatkan kata-kata cinta itu pada pusaranya. Sebaliknya ucapkan kata-kata cinta yang tersimpan dibenakmu itu sekarang selagi ada hayatnya. c)Cinta ia tetap hadir, ia datang bukan dengan nafsu atau keinginan tetapi kepasrahan tentang yang mutlak, itulah cinta terulung. d) Mungkin Tuhan menginginkan kita bertemu dan bercinta dengan orang yang salah sebelum bertemu dengan orang yang tepat, kita harus mengerti bagaimana berterima kasih atas kurniaan itu. e) Sungguh menyakitkan mencintai seseorang yang tidak mencintaimu, tetapi lebih menyakitkan adalah mencintai seseorang dan tidak pernah memiliki keberanian untuk menyatakan cintamu kepadanya. f) Cinta adalah keabadian...dan kenangan adalah hal terindah yg pernah dialami. g) Kita tidak pernah tahu bila kita akan jatuh cinta. Namun apabila sampai saatnya itu, raihlah dengan kedua tanganmu dan jangan biarkan dia pergi dengan sejuta rasa tanda tanya dihatinya h) Cinta bukanlah dari kata-kata tetapi dari segumpal keinginan diberi pada hati yang memerlukan. Tangisan juga bukanlah pengubat cinta kerana ia tidak mengerti perjalananan hati naluri. i) Cinta seringkali akan lari bila kita mencari, tetapi cintajua seringkali dibiarkan pergi bila ia menghampiri. j) Cinta pertama adalah kenangan. Cinta kedua menjadi pengajaran. Dan cinta yang seterusnya adalah satu keperluan kerana hidup tanpa cinta bagaikan masakan tanpa garam. Lantaran itu bajailah cinta yang dianugerahkan itu sebaik-baiknya. Agar ia terus mekar dan wangi sepanjang musim. k) Cinta tidak selalu bersama jodoh tapi jodoh selalu bersama cinta p/s: Nice urlLink quotes ...suddenly remind me to my beloved fiance :)
Not much productive works for today. All the urlLink bank and cash reconciliation works have been sucessful done. Tomorrow my life will ruine up again since a new urlLink job will be assign.

Hello, I'm in Prodata HQ again doing my work, but this time the productive job (hehehe...at last). I was assign to do a training module as we had a brainstorming for the last 2 days preparing the end-user SLP training module. And for today, I had finish my work....la la la la.... I feel like jumping when my sister has just call me and said that she get a job as Trainee Engineer at ENC company in PJ. I guess that this would be the grand present for Abah as he will celebrate his birthday tomorrow. Happy Birthday Abah, semoga dipanjangkan umur, dimurahkan rezeki dan diredhai Tuhan dunia Akhirat. Ida sayang Abah :-)

Battery Low Demotivated as usual. Pending job of uploading template. Haaacuuum..!! I have flu + not feeling well inside my body + my skin starts dry. I'm freezing like death in this office as the air-conditioning starts operating well after a monthly services. Mental Block Huuaarrgg...sleepy. Do not know what to do. I'm surfing the net and chats on MSN Messenger like nobody's business.. Heh.. Who cares by the way..? I have done all my job excluded the pending one. And the one that I loved to do is my blogger...hehehe Mood Swing ?? My body is in the office but my soul flies through my hometown. I miss mak and abah. Can't wait to act like a sleeping beauty girl on the bed with my teddy and along (read this as my cute cat). Pray for a safety journey tomorrow. I think, nop...exactly I'm putting my weight already and this makes me uncomfortable. I feel like soo lazy, heavy, sleepy and to be worst my mouth keeps chewing any food on the table especially the junk one. Huh..what am I supposed to do. Non productive works = eat + eat + eat (which is bad habit at all) Non Next week would be my last day in Prodata HQ as I have to go back to Segamat and do my routine work as usual :-( Probably I will never have a time to update my blogger since my office there don't have any connection/online excluded the SAP line. But I'll try my best to write at least once a month as I will miss my weblog soon...hihihi Hey, my 'daddy' syahman has just join my blogger...hehehe, statue your name into my journal. Proud haa ^_^ Another craps from me quoted from Bluehikari : "Buang kusut benang putus asa, kaitkan ia menjadi sabar dan jadikanlah ia alas ketabahan. Sempurna semuanya, tawakkal kepada Allah biar ia kekal dalam diri menjadi hiasan..." Nice...very nice. Isn't it right ? p/s : All the best for my colleague @ housemate - L**D* as she will tie up into another new phase of her life which called a 'merisik' during this weekend and getting engaged probably end of this month. A big congratz also to my friends H**A and A**A for their married. Happy Ever After.

Jika kamu memancing ikan Setelah ikan itu terlekat di mata kail hendaklah kamu mengambilnya terus ikan itu Jangan sesekali kamu lepaskan ia semula ke dalam air begitu saja Kerana ia akan sakit oleh kerana bisanya ketajaman mata kail mu Dan mungkin akan menderita selagi ia masih hidup... Begitula juga setelah kamu memberi banyak pengharapan kepada seseorang Setelah ia mula menyayangi mu, hendaklah kamu menjaga hatinya Jangan sesekali kamu meninggalkannya begitu sahaja Kerana dia akan terluka oleh kenangan bersamamu dan Mungkin tidak dapat melupakan segalanya selagi dia mengingatimu. Jika kamu menadah air biarlah berpada Jangan terlalu mengharap pada takungannya dan Jangan lah ia begitu teguh...cukup la sekadar keperluanmu Apabila sekali ia retak, tentu sukar untuk kamu menampalnya semula Akhirnya ia dibuang...sedangkan jika kamu membaikinya Mungkin ia masih boleh digunakan lagi Begitu juga jika kamu memiliki seseorang...terimalah seadanya Jangan lah kamu terlalu menganguminya dan Janganlah kamu menganggapnya begitu istimewa Anggaplah dia manusia biasa Apabila sekali dia melakukan kesilapan, bukan mudah bagi kamu untuk menerimanya Akhirnya kamu kecewa dan meninggalkannya Sedangkan jika kamu memaafkannya boleh jadi hubungan kamu akan berterusan hingga akhirnya... Jika kamu telah memiliki sepinggan nasi Yang kamu pasti baik untuk dirimu...mengenyangkan...berkhasiat Mengapa kamu berlengah, cuba mencari makanan yang lain Terlalu ingin mengejar kelazatan Kelak nasi itu akan basi dan kamu tidak boleh memakannya Kamu akan menyesal. Begitu juga jika kamu telah bertemu dengan seseorang insan Yang kamu pasti membawa kebaikan kepada kamu Menyayangimu...Mengasihimu Mengapa kamu berlengah Cuba membandingkannya dengan yang lain Terlalu mengejar lesempurnaan kelak kamu kehilangannya dan kamu akan menyesal Apabila dia beralih arah... p/s : Satu nasihat buat teman ku L**A : If you loves someone, set him free. If he comes back, he is yours and if he doesn't, it was never meant to be...

Another craps also from 'hanyasayang' weblog as I have no idea what to do in this office hour....boring. I have a template to upload into the system but have to pending it since the commitment type of GL does not have enough budget. Then, I have to wait until the budget approved by Financial team. Back to the test, so...I'm group of AUTUMN season. Hemmm....like a environment in Autum In My Heart :-) The Season You Are Most Like Is : + Friendly + Confused + Shy + Warm + Approachable + Caring It described : You're warm, and the most approachable. You have that gentle prescence about you. People can relate to you, and find you easy company. However, it's likely you've been hurt in the past and it has left you scarred so things can become rather chilly with you at times. Being the third season in, you're mature, thrustworthy and loyal to your friends but prone to depression and negative thinking. Well done...You're the shy and sensitive season :-)

I had done a personality or enneagram test which I craps from 'hanyasayang' weblog. It is call urlLink Riso-Hudson Enneagram Type Indicator (RHETI) Sample. The RHETI can help you determine your Enneagram type which you have to answer 38 of questions in this saample test. While there is no guarantee, your highest score can indicate your basic type. So, here it is...a conclusion of my enneagram. Type 1 : The Reformer. The rational, idealistic type. (0) Tyoe 2 : The Helper. The caring, naturing type. (6) Type 3 : The Motivator. The adaptable, success oriented type. (3) Type 4 : The Artist. The intuitive, reserved type. (5) Type 5 : The thinker. The perceptive, cerebral type. (2) Type 6 : The Skeptic. The committed, security-oriented type. (4) Type 7 : The Generalist. The enthusiastic, productive type. (6) Type 8 : The Leader. The powerful, aggresive type. (4) Type 9 : The peacemaker. The easygoing, accomodating type. (6) Hemm...among my top score, I conclude that I am type of Helper , Generalist , Peacemaker and Artist person. Is that me..?? Yaaa, I think I am but the most important thing is what people see in you right :-) So, have a try with this test.

Now I can imagine what it's like when they said about pimple and it's unpleasant ache. Why so...because at this moment i got pimple in one of my chicks. Gosh, I hate this dull ache..this is one of those very rare situation for me. Please just go away... Sorry, another urlLink craps from me...

Hai, here I am again after being hibernating for 3 days. Still in the urlLink office and doing nothing much productive works, as usual...boring and demotivating. I feel like a dummy sitting on the chair all day long and off course it's not something good at all. urlLink Time flies, huh, it's been almost 3 months staying here in HQ KL. Being with beloved fiance the whole weekend makes me cheer up again. Thanks dear for being such a wonderful man. And again I had a good urlLink time for last couple of days. And I want you to know that I really appreciate what you are and have been doing so far. Only I know.... :-) Recap for the past few days, we were urlLink shopping at Mid Valley and OU. Plan to go to IKEA but don't have enough urlLink time , maybe some other urlLink time ok dear :-) I bought a simple but nice color of blouse, two-way clear smooth maybelline as I got 20% voucher of it (worth it huh) and my other half a pair of renome slack and of course his PS2 vcd urlLink games . Also catch a urlLink movie of "A Day After Tomorrow" and "I-Robot". Due to the tiredness of both of us during the day urlLink time , we managed to take a nap in the middle of the peak scene. Mampukah aku menjadi seperti Siti Khatijah? Agung cintanya pada Allah dan Rasulullah. Hartanya diperjuangkan ke jalan fisabilillah. Penawar hati kekasih Allah. Susah dan senang rela bersama... Dapatkah kudidik jiwa seperti Siti Aishah? Isteri Rasulullah yang bijak. Pendorong kesusahan dan penderitaan. Tiada sukar untuk dilaksanakan... Mengalir air mataku, melihat pegorbanan puteri solehah Siti Fatimah. Akur dalam setiap perintah Taat dengan abuyanya, yang sentiasa berjuang. Tiada memiliki harta dunia. Layaklah dia sebagai wanita penghulu syurga... Ketika aku marah, inginku intip serpihan sabar. Dari catatan hidup Siti Sarah....Tabah jiwaku Setabah umi Nabi Ismail. Mengendong bayinya yang masih merah. Mencari air penghilang dahaga. Di terik padang pasir merak. Ditinggalkan suami akur tanpa bantah. Pengharapannya hanya pada Allah Itulah wanita Siti Hajar.... Mampukah aku menjadi wanita solehah? Mati dalam keunggulan iman. Bersinar indah, harum tersebar. Bagai wanginya pusara Masyitah.... p/s : buat pedoman kaum Hawa dan peringatan diri.
